features.title: Entity-Component-System Architecture
features.description: Modular, data-oriented design pattern that separates game logic from data, enabling efficient memory usage and parallel processing.

features.title: High-Performance Rendering
features.description: Custom OpenGL renderer with sprite batching, texture atlasing, and shader management for optimal GPU utilization.

features.title: Multi-threaded Systems
features.description: Parallel processing for physics, rendering, and game logic using modern C++ threading primitives.

features.title: Flexible Input System
features.description: Unified input handling supporting keyboard, mouse, and gamepad with customizable key bindings and input mapping.

features.title: Scripting Integration
features.description: Lua scripting support for rapid gameplay prototyping and runtime behavior modification.

features.title: Developer Tools
features.description: Built-in profiler, entity inspector, and debug rendering for efficient development and optimization.
